name: The Greatest Jelly Fish
description:
The Greatest Jelly Fish. 

Dodge and zap your way through all the waves of fish, sharks and electric eels.  How high can you score?

Sharks take 10 hits.
Piranhas take 4 hits
Electric Eels take 2 hits.
Puffer Fish take 1 hit.

Careful not to hit any enemies or Game Over!

Controls:
Use keyboard keys A, S, D, and W to swim.
Use mouse to fire!
